people.name: Sidney Arodin
people.description: Sidney Arnandan or Arnondrin or Arnondin, better known as Sidney Arodin  was an American jazz clarinetist and songwriter, best known for co-writing the pop standard "Lazy River" with Hoagy Carmichael.

people.name: Al Sherman
people.description: Al Sherman  was a popular songwriter active during the Tin Pan Alley era in American music history.

people.name: Armand J. Piron
people.description: Armand John "A. J. " Piron  was an American jazz violinist, band leader, and composer.

people.name: Clifford Brown
people.description: Clifford Brown , aka "Brownie", was an American jazz trumpeter.

people.name: Elmon Wright
people.description: Elmon Wright  was an American jazz trumpeter.  He was the son of Lammar Wright, Sr.

people.name: On My Way
people.description: "On My Way" is a Louis Armstrong song that appeared on the album Louis and the Good Book in 1958 and was issued with "I'll String Along with You" as a single in 1959.

people.name: Benny Bailey
people.description: Ernest Harold "Benny" Bailey  was an American bebop and hard-bop jazz trumpeter.

items.name: Jazz
items.description: It is a photograph about Jazz. In a corner, it says:Jazz is a music genre that originated from African American communities of New Orleans in the United States during the late 19th and early 20th centuries.   There are things written behind: Clifford Brown Hello, Dolly! (song)   And the following place: Wilmington, Delaware

items.name: Crowbar
items.description: A crowbar. Can be used to break chains
